mapper.select: /*pgmId=I18nMapper.selectWord*/ SELECT WORD_CD AS CODE ,WORD_NM AS NAME FROM COMMON_I18N_WORD WHERE WORD_CD = UPPER(#{code}) AND LANG_CD = UPPER(NVL(#{lang},'en'))
/*pgmId=I18nMapper.select_message*/ SELECT MSG_CD AS CODE ,MSG_NM AS NAME FROM COMMON_I18N_MESSAGE WHERE MSG_CD = UPPER(#{code}) AND LANG_CD = UPPER(NVL(#{lang},'en'))
/*pgmId=I18nMapper.selectMessageList*/ SELECT MSG_CD AS CODE ,MSG_NM AS NAME FROM COMMON_I18N_MESSAGE WHERE BASC_MSG_FLAG = UPPER(#{bascMsgFlag}) AND LANG_CD = UPPER(NVL(#{lang},'en'))
